There is a 1.8GB disk which has SP1 setup files on them "Windows6.1-KB976932-X64" and "Windows6.1-KB976932-X86", this is the actual Windows installation disk with Home Basic, Home Premium, Ultimate and Profession Editions, all with SP1 integrated.

Useful for those who want to fresh install with SP1 already installed.

I integrated the updates myself and have tested them :)
